jobDescription: Candidates will assist in the development of Anthropometric software related to the interrogation of 3-Dimensional(3D) data. Our software focuses on providing researchers with tools to analyze 3D human body models as well as 3D clothing and equipment. Candidates will be exposed to a variety of technologies including (but not limited to): HTML, CSS, Javascript, C++, Python, Qt, Node.js, Unity, Git/Mercurial(Hg). Interns will be expected to write well developed code to include unit and regression tests. Senior mentor(s) will provide assistance and code review as needed. Eligibility:Required: B.S. or M.S. in Computer ScienceRequired: Strong experience with either Python or C++.Optional: Experience with Computational Geometry, Qt, Boost, Scipy, Node.js, Matlab.
